definitions.definition: to leave your job or stop working because of old age or ill health:
examples: Since retiring from the company, she has done voluntary work for a charity.

definitions.definition: to stop taking part in a race or competition because of illness or injury:
examples: She retired from the competition after pulling a leg muscle.

definitions.definition: to make someone leave their job, usually at a time when they are near to the age at which theywould normally stop working, or because of illness:
examples: Following the merger, he was retired with a generous pension.
